projects.name: Survey Project
projects.description: Dive into the Survey project, a programming venture where you'll sculpt a sturdy data model to adeptly manage survey responses. Embark on crafting an intuitive user interface, enabling effortless survey creation and participation. Additionally, you'll explore data by implementing a module that converts raw responses into insightful, visual interpretations, ensuring users derive valuable insights with ease.

projects.name: Music Releases Project
projects.description: Navigate through the melodic pathways of the MusicRelease project, a harmonious blend of programming and digital distribution. Engage in building a platform that empowers artists to upload, share, and monetize their creations with ease. Craft an intuitive and engaging user interface, forging a seamless connection between artists and their audience. Delve into managing artist and track data meticulously while providing dynamic, insightful analytics about listener engagement and track popularity.
